name: flights_list_by_airline
description: Retrieve a list of flights operated by a specified airline using the RapidAPI Flight Radar service.

airline.description: The ICAO code of the airline whose flights are to be listed. This value can be obtained from the 'icao' field returned by the /airlines/list or /flights/detail endpoints, or the 'operator' field from the /flights/search endpoint.

name: trim_view
description: Fetches and returns all data associated with a specific vehicle trim using the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The ID of the vehicle trim to retrieve.

name: v1_aircraft
description: Queries the API Ninjas Aircraft API to return a list of aircraft that match the given parameters.

min_height.description: Minimum height of the aircraft in feet.

min_wingspan.description: Minimum wingspan of the aircraft in feet.

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 30.

max_height.description: Maximum height of the aircraft in feet.

max_length.description: Maximum length of the aircraft in feet.

min_length.description: Minimum length of the aircraft in feet.

max_range.description: Maximum range of the aircraft in nautical miles.

min_range.description: Minimum range of the aircraft in nautical miles.

max_wingspan.description: Maximum wingspan of the aircraft in feet.

engine_type.description: Type of engine. Must be one of: piston, propjet, jet.

manufacturer.description: Company that designed and built the aircraft. Defaults to 'Gulfstream'.

name: us_az
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Arizona.

date.description: The date for historical gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to None.

name: get_directions
description: Fetch driving directions from an origin to a destination.

origin.description: The starting point specified as a free-text location query or latitude, longitude pair.
origin.default: Church St & 29th St, San-Francisco, CA, USA

destination.description: The destination specified as a free-text location query or latitude, longitude pair.

avoid_routes.description: Route types to avoid, specified as a comma-delimited list (e.g., 'tolls,ferries').

country.description: The country or region to use for the query, specified as a 2-letter country code.

arrival_time.description: Arrival time specified as a Unix-Timestamp in destination local time

language.description: The language to use for the query, specified as a 2-letter language code.

departure_time.description: Departure time specified as a Unix-Timestamp in origin local time

distance_units.description: The distance units in the response ('auto', 'km', 'mi'). Default is `None`, which

name: vehicle_attributes
description: Fetches all available options for a given vehicle attribute using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

attribute.description: The attribute options to be returned. Defaults to 'bodies.type'.

name: us_fl
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Florida.

date.description: Date for which to fetch historical gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to None.

name: v1_airlines
description: Fetches airline information using the API Ninjas Airlines API given certain parameters.

iata.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 2-character airline code. Defaults to None.

name.description: Airline name. Supports partial matching (e.g., 'United' will match 'United Airlines'). Defaults to 'Singapore Airlines'.

icao.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) 3-character airline code. Defaults to None.

name: v1_motorcycles
description: Fetches motorcycle data from the Motorcycles API, returning up to 30 results that match the given parameters.

model.description: Name of the motorcycle model. Supports partial matching (default is 'Ninja').

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination. Default is None.

make.description: Name of the manufacturer/brand. Supports partial matching (default is 'Kawasaki').

year.description: Release year of the motorcycle model in YYYY format. Default is None.

name: get_taxi_fares
description: Calculate taxi fares between two geographical points using the RapidAPI taxi fare calculator.

name: interior_colors
description: Fetches interior color details for a car based on various query parameters.

trim.description: The trim level of the car.

direction.description: The sorting direction, either 'asc' or 'desc'. Default is 'asc'.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

make_model_trim_id.description: The unique ID for make, model, and trim combination.

rgb.description: The RGB value of the color.

sort.description: The field to sort by. Default is 'id'.

verbose.description: If 'yes', includes detailed information about make, model, and trim. Default is 'yes'.

json.description: A URL encoded JSON array of conditions to filter results.

make_id.description: The ID of the car make.

make_model_id.description: The ID for make and model combination.

name: bodies
description: Fetches a list of vehicle bodies based on various query parameters.

make_model_trim_id.description: ID representing the make, model, and trim combination.

direction.description: Sorting direction, either 'asc' or 'desc'. Default is 'asc'.

page.description: Pagination parameter to specify the page of results.

verbose.description: Includes additional details like make, model, and trim when set to 'yes'. Default is 'yes'.

json.description: JSON-encoded string for complex query conditions.

sort.description: Field by which to sort the results. Default is 'id'.

make_model_id.description: ID representing the make and model combination.

type.description: Type of the vehicle, such as SUV, Van, etc.

limit.description: Limit on the number of results returned.

doors.description: Number of doors on the vehicle.

name: airports_nonstop_routes_for_an_airport
description: Fetches a list of nonstop routes for a specified airport using the RapidAPI service.

airportiatacode.description: The IATA code for the airport.

name: mileages
description: Fetch mileage data from the car API based on various optional filters and sorting options.

make_model_id.description: The ID of the make and model.

limit.description: The number of results to limit the response to.

make_model_trim_id.description: The ID of the make, model, and trim.

trim.description: The trim level of the car.

json.description: An array of URL encoded JSON conditions for complex queries.

sort.description: The field to sort the results by. Default is 'id'.

direction.description: The direction to sort by ('asc' or 'desc'). Default is 'asc'.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.

combined_mpg.description: The combined miles per gallon value.

verbose.description: Include make, model and trim information in the results. Default is 'yes'.

epa_highway_mpg.description: The EPA highway miles per gallon value.

epa_city_mpg.description: The EPA city miles per gallon value.

make_id.description: The ID of the car make.

name: get_train_data_mrt_id_id_get
description: Fetch train data using MRT ID from the RapidAPI service.

is_id.description: The MRT ID to fetch the train data for.

name: get_car_versions
description: Get the different versions of a car model using the toolbench RapidAPI.

model.description: The specific model of the car.

name: trims
description: Fetch car trim details from the RapidAPI endpoint with various filter options.

limit.description: Limit the number of results returned.

direction.description: Order direction of the results, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Default is 'asc'.

sort.description: The field to sort results by. Default is 'id'.

page.description: Specify the page number for paginated results.

make_model_id.description: Filter results by make model ID.

verbose.description: If 'yes', includes detailed information such as year, make, model, and trim in the returned data. Default is 'yes'.

json.description: An array of URL encoded JSON conditions for complex queries.

name: us_ar
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Arkansas.

date.description: A date string in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' to query historical gas price data. Defaults to None.

name: v1_helicopter
description: Fetches a list of helicopter specifications from the API Ninjas Helicopter API that match the given parameters.

max_height.description: Maximum height of the helicopter in feet.

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

min_height.description: Minimum height of the helicopter in feet.

max_length.description: Maximum length of the helicopter in feet.

min_length.description: Minimum length of the helicopter in feet.

min_speed.description: Minimum maximum air speed in knots.

min_range.description: Minimum range of the helicopter in nautical miles.

max_range.description: Maximum range of the helicopter in nautical miles.

max_speed.description: Maximum maximum air speed in knots.

manufacturer.description: Company that designed and built the helicopter. Default is 'Bell'.

name: get_car_models
description: Fetches all car models for a specified car maker using the InfoCars API.

maker.description: The name of the car maker to fetch the models for.

name: get_airline_details
description: Fetch details for an airline based on its IATA code.

code.description: The IATA code of the airline for which details are to be fetched.

name: flights_list_in_boundary
description: Fetches a list of flights within a specified geographical bounding box and returns flight information based on various optional filters.

bl_lng.description: The bottom left longitude of the bounding box.

tr_lat.description: The top right latitude of the bounding box.

bl_lat.description: The bottom left latitude of the bounding box.

tr_lng.description: The top right longitude of the bounding box.

type.description: Filter by the value of the 'Code' field returned in the aircrafts/list endpoint.

speed.description: Filter by speed. The format is min,max (e.g., "0,460").

airline.description: Filter by the value of the 'ICAO' field returned in the airlines/list endpoint.

altitude.description: Filter by altitude. The format is min,max (e.g., "0,48000").

airport.description: Filter by the 'icao' field of the airport.

limit.description: The maximum number of flights per response (default is 300; max is 300).

name: us_dc
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Washington D.C.

date.description: The date for which to fetch historical gas price data. Defaults to None.

name: v1_vinlookup
description: Retrieves key vehicle information including manufacturer, country of origin, and model year for a given VIN using the API Ninjas VIN Lookup API.

vin.description: A valid Vehicle Identification Number (VIN), which must be a 17-character string.

name: livetraffic
description: Retrieves information about all aircraft within a 25-nautical mile radius of the specified latitude and longitude.

lat.description: Latitude of the center point (-90 to 90).

lon.description: Longitude of the center point (-180 to 180). Note: Longitude in the US is typically negative.

name: airports_direct_routes_for_an_airport
description: Returns a list of direct routes for a given airport using the RapidAPI service.

airportiatacode.description: The IATA code of the airport for which the direct routes are being queried.

name: get_airport_details
description: Fetches and returns detailed information about an airport specified by its IATA code.

code.description: A valid three-letter IATA airport code.

name: us_ky
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Kentucky.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, current gas prices are returned.

name: models
description: Search for car models based on various criteria such as year, make, model, make_id, and more. The results can be customized using different parameters to limit, sort, and filter the data.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

make_id.description: The ID of the car make to filter the results.

year.description: The year to filter the car models.

page.description: The page number for paginated results.

sort.description: The field to sort the results by. Default is 'id'.

make.description: The car make to filter the results.

model.description: The car model to filter the results.

direction.description: The direction for sorting ('asc' or 'desc'). Default is 'asc'.

verbose.description: Whether to include detailed information like make, model, and trim. Default is 'yes'.

name: us_al
description: Fetch the current or historical gas price data for Alabama.

date.description: The date for which to retrieve historical gas price data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current gas price data is fetched.

name: driving_directions
description: Fetches driving directions and routes between specified source and destination coordinates using the Waze/Google API.

source_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the starting point.

destination_coordinates.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the destination.

return_route_coordinates.description: Whether to return the route coordinate pairs. Defaults to None.

arrival_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) of the desired arrival time. Defaults to None, which returns directions for the current time.

name: v1_airports
description: Fetches information from the API Ninjas Airports API endpoint based on specified search criteria. At least one of the optional parameters must be provided.

offset.description: Number of results to offset for pagination.

region.description: Administrative region such as state or province within a country (e.g., California).

name.description: Airport name. This parameter supports partial matching (e.g., Heathrow will match London Heathrow Airport). Defaults to 'London Heathrow'.

icao.description: International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) 4-character airport code.

iata.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 3-character airport code.

name: get_airplane_details
description: Fetches details of an airplane using the provided code.

code.description: The unique identifier of the airplane to fetch details for.

name: us_ga
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Georgia.

date.description: The date for which to fetch historical data in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current gas price data is returned.

name: specs_v1_tier1
description: Fetch vehicle data based on specified query parameters using the RapidAPI Datamo endpoint.

make.description: The make of the vehicle. This parameter is required.

sortby.description: The field to sort the results by.

order.description: The sort order of the specified field.

page.description: The page number of the results, starting with index 1.

per_page.description: The number of entries per page. Default is 10, with a maximum of 250.

fields.description: Specific fields to return in the results. Leave blank to return all fields.

name: us_ca
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for California.

date.description: Specific date for historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not provided, the current gas price data is returned. Defaults to None.

name: engines
description: Fetches engine information from a car API based on various query parameters.

direction.description: The direction to sort the results by, either 'asc' or 'desc'. Defaults to 'asc'.

valves.description: The number of valves in the engine.

valve_timing.description: The valve timing of the engine.

fuel_type.description: The fuel type of the vehicle.

json.description: A JSON string for complex queries.

make_model_id.description: The ID of the make and model.

trim.description: The trim level of the vehicle.

cam_type.description: The cam type of the engine.

make_model_trim_id.description: The ID of the make, model, and trim.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

drive_type.description: The drive type of the vehicle.

verbose.description: Include additional information such as make, model, and trim when 'yes'. Defaults to 'yes'.

cylinders.description: The number of cylinders in the engine.

page.description: The page number of the results.

sort.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'id'.

horsepower_hp.description: The horsepower of the engine in HP.

transmission.description: The type of transmission in the vehicle.

name: us_de
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Delaware.

date.description: A specific date for querying historical gas price data. If not provided, the current gas price data is returned.

name: get_car_data
description: Fetch specifications, pictures, and average pricing of a car based on its model, year, and maker.

year.description: The year the car was manufactured.

name: ar_by_city_state
description: Fetches augmented reality (AR) data for a given city and state using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

city.description: The name of the city for which AR data is requested.

state.description: The name of the state for which AR data is requested.

name: us_ia
description: Retrieves current or historical gas price data for Iowa.

date.description: Specific date for querying historical data starting from 2023-06-01. Defaults to None.

name: us_ak
description: Fetches current or historical gas price data for Alaska.

date.description: A string representing a date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format to query historical gas price data. Defaults to None.

name: get_wagons_mrt_train_no_wagons_get
description: Fetches the number of wagons for a given MRT train using the RapidAPI service.

train_no.description: The unique identifier for the MRT train.

name: alerts_and_jams
description: Fetch real-time alerts and traffic jams from Waze in a specified geographic rectangular area.

top_right.description: Latitude, longitude pair defining the top-right corner of the geographic area.

bottom_left.description: Latitude, longitude pair defining the bottom-left corner of the geographic area.

max_alerts.description: Maximum number of alerts to fetch. Defaults to 20. Set to 0 to avoid fetching alerts.

max_jams.description: Maximum number of traffic jams to fetch. Defaults to 20. Set to 0 to avoid fetching traffic jams.
